data.title: Full Stack Developer
data.description: I lead the development of a fitness application in Bangkok, built from the ground up by our team. After a year of dedicated development, the app successfully launched and now serves 5,000+ daily users. I oversee and contribute to both backend and frontend, ensuring seamless functionality, guiding development best practices, and driving continuous improvements to optimize performance and user experience.
data.companyName: Be Fit For Life Co., Ltd

data.title: Frontend Developer, Mobile
data.description: As the lead developer for FlaminGO!, I spearheaded the project to rebuild the app from the ground up using Flutter/Dart technology, enabling the app to function seamlessly on both iOS and Android platforms. My responsibilities included overseeing the entire development process, from planning and design to coding, testing, and deployment. The app saw significant improvements in performance and speed, ensuring smooth navigation and an enhanced user experience. This project was pivotal in my transition from web to mobile development, marking a key milestone in my career.

data.title: Junior Web Developer
data.description: Developed and maintained various websites and e-commerce platforms, primarily using WordPress/PHP and Shopify. Worked closely with designers and clients to deliver tailored solutions, ensuring optimal performance and functionality while adhering to best development practices

data.title: Web Developer
data.description: Contributed to the development and maintenance of client websites. Collaborated with senior developers to implement client-specific features, ensuring high-quality results and smooth functionality throughout the project lifecycle
